languages.text: {n}Стоит вам войти, как все взгляды в помещении обращаются в вашу сторону. Комиссар громко гаркает команду, и бойцы синхронно отдают честь.{/n} "Слава династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Стоит вам войти, как все взгляды в помещении обращаются в вашу сторону. Комиссар громко гаркает команду, и бойцы синхронно отдают честь.{/n} "Слава династии фон Валанциус!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}Стоит вам войти, как все взгляды в помещении обращаются в вашу сторону. Комиссар громко гаркает команду, и бойцы синхронно отдают честь.{/n} "Слава династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command, and the fighters salute you in perfect sync.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}あなたが入ってくるやいなや、会場にいる全員の視線があなたに向けられる。コミッサーが指揮をとると、戦士たちは一糸乱れることなくであなたに敬礼する。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが入ってくるやいなや、会場にいる全員の視線があなたに向けられる。コミッサーが指揮をとると、戦士たちは一糸乱れることなくであなたに敬礼する。{/n}「フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}你刚一进门，房间里所有人的目光都转向了你。政委发出命令，战士们齐声向你敬礼。{/n}“荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}你刚一进门，房间里所有人的目光都转向了你。政委发出命令，战士们齐声向你敬礼。{/n}“荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯家族！”
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}En cuanto entras, los ojos de todos los presentes se vuelven hacia ti. El Comisario ladra una orden y los guerreros te saludan al unísono.{/n} «¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto entras, los ojos de todos los presentes se vuelven hacia ti. El Comisario ladra una orden y los guerreros te saludan en perfecta sincronía.{/n} «¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!».
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Kaum trittst du ein, richten sich alle Augen im Raum auf dich. Der Kommissar bellt einen Befehl, und die Kämpfer salutieren in perfektem Gleichklang vor dir.{/n} "Es lebe Haus Valancius!"
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kaum trittst du ein, richten sich alle Augen im Raum auf dich. Der Kommissar bellt einen Befehl, und die Kämpfer salutieren perfekt synchron vor dir.{/n} "Es lebe Haus Valancius!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Dès que vous entrez, tous les regards se tournent vers vous. Le commissaire aboie un ordre, et tous les combattants se mettent au garde-à-vous tel un seul homme.{/n} « Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que vous entrez, tous les regards se tournent vers vous. Le commissaire aboie un ordre, et immédiatement, tous les combattants se mettent au garde-à-vous tel un seul homme.{/n} « Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! »
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True

languages.text: {n}Sen odaya girer girmez odadaki herkesin gözü sana dönüyor. Komiser'in bağırarak emir vermesiyle birlikte tüm savaşçılar, mükemmel bir uyum içinde seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa!"
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as you walk in, the eyes of everyone in the room turn to you. The Commissar barks a command and the fighters salute you in perfect unison.{/n} "Glory to House von Valancius!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Sen odaya girer girmez, odadaki herkesin gözü sana dönüyor. Komiserin bağırarak emir vermesiyle birlikte tüm savaşçılar mükemmel bir uyum içinde seni selamlıyor.{/n} "Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa!"
traits.speaker: HumanCommissar_MeleeRanged_Prison_True
